app.name: Export Everything
app.short_description: Save and load export configurations for quick re-use, ensuring efficiency and convenience in your data management processes.
app.long_description:
Export Everything offers a 7 day trial version and includes the following features: 
 Export tickets, organizations, comments, users, custom fields and attachments with ease using our comprehensive export feature. 

 Select and export 100s of custom fields tailored to your specific needs.  

 Choose from a variety of predefined export formats such as CSV, XML, and JSON  

 Craft your own export formats 

 Save and load export configurations for quick re-use, ensuring efficiency and convenience in your data management processes
app.installation_instructions: Simply click on install to start using the App.
